npc.name: an orc
npc.desc: Orcs are the oldest and fiercest foes of humanity, but these days havebeen largely driven into Underground refuges. They have a facesomewhat like a pig and a muscular, man-like body. It has long beensaid that they eat the flesh of man, but I believe they harass man forhis gold, not for his meat. They are a cruel and rapacious lot, andthe surface is better for their absence, but there are those who saythat we may expect a great resurgence of orcish aggression in the nearfuture.
